item.description:
github.com/Whonix/Whonix

remove -S "$VMSIZE" to fix build due to port to Debian buster 

https://forums.whonix.org/t/port-whonix-from-debian-stretch-to-debian-buster/7101/10
by adrelanos on 12:07PM - 15 Apr 19 UTC
changed 1 files with 0 additions and 1 deletions.

item.title: port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Port to buster seems almost complete. Basic functionality is working.

All changes that happened due to the port:

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/5959902f0f8faf71c3b45e04c03ad7d5940cee2e...15.0.0.0.7-developers-only

Now it’s just about testing and bug fixing.

Read full topic
item.source: port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster

item.title: port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I guess KVM builds are entirely untested for now.

^ Please fix @HulaHoop.

(You might be able to run that build step manually by now.)

github.com

Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/build-steps.d/2400_convert-raw-to-qcow2#L36-L47

    

  1. ## Create qcow2 image form raw image.
    2. 

  2. ## VMSIZE defaults to 100G as per help-steps/variables.
    3. 

  3. sudo $SUDO_OPTS \
    4. 

  4.    qemu-img \
    5. 

  5.       convert \
    6. 

  6.          -p \
    7. 

  7.          -O qcow2 \
    8. 

  8.          -S "$VMSIZE" \
    9. 

  9.          -o cluster_size=2M \
    10. 

  10.          -o preallocation=metadata \
    11. 

  11.          "$binary_image_raw" \
    12. 

  12.          "$binary_image_qcow2"
    13.

Read full topic
item.source: port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster

item.title: port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster
item.dc:creator: onion_knight
item.description:
Following instructions here

Whonix

Dev/Build Documentation/15 full

Instructions to build Whonix Virtual Machine Images from Source Code.

Gateway-XFCE build fails at 2400_convert-raw-to-qcow2 stage with

qemu-img: Invalid buffer size for sparse output specified. Valid sizes are multiples of 512 up to 16777216. Select 0 to disable sparse detection (fully allocates output).

last_failed_bash_command: sudo $SUDO_OPTS qemu-img convert -p -O qcow2 -S "$VMSIZE" -o cluster_size=2M -o preallocation=metadata "$binary_image_raw" "$binary_image_qcow2"

Read full topic
item.source: port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster

item.title: port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
onion_knight:

I don’t see an option to build the developers-only version?

There’s no special option. Just use Whonix 14 build documentation, instead whenever it says “stretch”, think “buster” and use the developers-only tag.

onion_knight:

Do I need a Buster machine to build it?

Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster
item.dc:creator: 2-unglaubig
item.description:
Patrick:

Work in progress. See git master.


[https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/tree/master/buildconfig.d]
That red miniature dachshund barking noise can be heard from outside Andy’s ummm Patrick’s verkshop
Rex: “Oh! It’s Buster!”
Sarge: “Canine alert! Man your battle stations! Let’s move, move, move!”

Patrick: Werk in progress. See git meister… (Hundefutter

Me thinking out loud… dogfooding coming soon to a Whonix kennel nearby LOL

Thank You Patrick & Co
